00014 BatteryAccess::BatteryAccess():
00015   BaseModule(),
00016   battery(NULL),
00017   deviceID(-1)
00018 {}

00020 BatteryAccess::BatteryAccess(unsigned stacksize):
00021   BaseModule(stacksize),
00022   battery(NULL),
00023   deviceID(-1)
00024 {}
00025 
00026 void BatteryAccess::registerWithBattery(const std::string& name, int numAccounts) {
00027   battery = FindModule<BaseBattery*>::findSubModule(findHost());
00028 
00029   if(!battery) {
00030     opp_warning("No battery module defined!");
00031   } else {
00032     deviceID = battery->registerDevice(name, numAccounts);
00033   }
00034 }
00035 
00036 void BatteryAccess::draw(DrawAmount& amount, int account) {
00037   if(!battery)
00038     return;
00039 
00040   battery->draw(deviceID, amount, account);
00041 }
00042 
00043 void BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(double amount, int account) {
00044   if(!battery)
00045     return;
00046 
00047   DrawAmount val(DrawAmount::CURRENT, amount);
00048   battery->draw(deviceID, val, account);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void BatteryAccess::drawEnergy(double amount, int account) {
00052   if(!battery)
00053     return;
00054 
00055   DrawAmount val(DrawAmount::ENERGY, amount);
00056   battery->draw(deviceID, val, account);
00057 }
